devdoc.details: Uses Zama FHE solidity library for encrypted types and checks.      Frontend/relayer must provide attestations / ZKPoKs when calling fromExternal      (so that the coprocessors sign only correct handles). The ZKPoK should bind      the encrypted plaintext value to the ETH sent (msg.value)  enforced off-chain.

canClaimProfit(uint256,address).details: User must decrypt locally to calculate actual profit

claimProfit(uint256,uint256,uint256,bool.details: User provides decrypted values locally (via SDK) and contract verifies them

params._decryptedSide: plaintext bet side (true = YES, false = NO)
params._decryptionProof: KMS decryption proof with signatures for amounts and side

params._endTime: Betting closes at this unix timestamp
params._resolutionTime: Oracle should resolve after this timestamp

makeUserBetsDecryptable(uint256).details: This allows users to decrypt their own bets locally via SDK      Note: This makes handles publicly decryptable, but users decrypt locally with their private key

placeBet(uint256,bytes32,bytes32,bytes,b.details: Frontend must encrypt both the amount and side, and produce coprocessor attestations (ZKPoK).      The ZKPoK should bind the ciphertext plaintext to msg.value (ETH sent).

params._amountProof: attestation / signatures from coprocessors for encrypted amount
params._encryptedSide: external encrypted side handle (true = YES, false = NO)
params._sideProof: attestation / signatures from coprocessors for encrypted side

setOutcome(uint256,bytes32,bytes).details: Oracle encrypts the result: true if YES won, false if NO won

params._encryptedOutcome: external encrypted outcome handle (true = YES won, false = NO won)
params._inputProof: attestation / signatures proving the ciphertext is well formed

params._decryptionProof: KMS decryption proof with signatures for both volumes

devdoc.title: HoloPredict

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

ZamaProtocolUnsupported().notice: Returned if the Zama protocol is not supported on the current chain

PublicDecryptionVerified(bytes32[],bytes.notice: This event is emitted when public decryption has been successfully verified.

canClaimProfit(uint256,address).notice: Check if user can claim profit (view-only)

cancelMarket(uint256).notice: Cancel a market before resolution (owner only)

claimProfit(uint256,uint256,uint256,bool.notice: Claim profit after market resolved and decryptions done

createMarket(string,uint256,uint256).notice: Create a new prediction market (only oracle or owner)

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraw all ETH to owner (only owner)

getEncryptedBets(uint256,address).notice: Return encrypted bet handles for a user (bytes32)

getEncryptedOutcome(uint256).notice: Return encrypted outcome handle (bytes32) for a market

getEncryptedVolumes(uint256).notice: Return encrypted volume handles (bytes32) for a market

getLiveMarketData(uint256).notice: Live market data (returns encrypted handles only)

getMarketInfo(uint256).notice: Get market info - decrypted values returned only when available

getMarketStats(uint256).notice: Get market stats for resulted markets

getUserBetInfo(uint256,address).notice: Get user's bet info (returns encrypted handles only)

makeUserBetsDecryptable(uint256).notice: Make user's bet handles decryptable for local decryption

placeBet(uint256,bytes32,bytes32,bytes,b.notice: Place an encrypted bet on a market

requestOutcomeDecryption(uint256).notice: Request decryption of the outcome (emits an event for relayer/Gateway)

requestVolumeDecryption(uint256).notice: Request decryption of total volumes (emits an event for relayer/Gateway)

setOutcome(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Oracle sets the encrypted outcome (decides YES or NO won)

verifyAndSetDecryptedOutcome(uint256,boo.notice: Verify and set decrypted outcome using FHEVM v0.9 signature verification

verifyAndSetDecryptedVolumes(uint256,uin.notice: Verify and set decrypted volumes using FHEVM v0.9 signature verification

userdoc.notice: Confidential prediction market using Zama FHEVM
